name: Schroedinger's Cardboard
description:
You are Schroedinger's cat and you are trapped inside a cardboard box maze.

Your goal is to escape before the Atom decays and a deadly poison is released.

The Geiger counter will indicate how probable a decay is. When the Geiger counter reaches it's maximum value the poison is released and you are dead. 

Use the arrow keys to move around.

Art: Mad_Moerges
Code: ko1N
